div.p: No.3148, 3156, pp. 123-4, unit 78, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.

Document is a circular (p. 123) individually addressed to the heads of 15 departments (listed on p. 124) within the Chief Secretary's Department. The Government Botanist is listed twice. Chief Secretary's Office

I beg to inform you that in those cases where the Public Service Board reports that the premium on a Life Policy has not been paid, it will be necessary in future that the premium be at once paid and the receipt forwarded to this Office without any delay, so as to prevent a double payment being made when the non-payment of the premium by the officer concerned is reported to the Under Treasurer by the Public Service Board.
